column4: when i connect the external hard disc , error: cannot mount the volume plz help me
when i connect the external hard disc , error: cannot mount the volume plz help me
can u find the drive by typing --  fdisk -l
s dhinesh
then try with mount command...like mount /dev/sda1 /mnt/ntfs
when i tried it only root can do that ? then what do plz help me i am new to ubuntu
if u press fdisk -l what it is showing ?
Disk /dev/sdc: 80.0 GB, 80026361856 bytes
255 heads, 63 sectors/track, 9729 cylinders
Units = cylinders of 16065 * 512 = 8225280 bytes
Disk identifier: 0xf7b5ba23
Device Boot      Start         End      Blocks   Id  System
/dev/sdc1               1        9729    78148161    7  HPFS/NTFS
help me
so /dev/sdc1 is ur external hdd s ?
yes
so go to terminal ...and type as > mount /dev/sdc1 /mnt/ntfs
then go ntfs dirctory and find the external hdd content
permission denied
permission denied is displayed what to do ?
permission denied is displayed what to do ?
: try with > sudo mount /dev/sdc1 /mnt/ntfs
